scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains minutes, financial records, and notes about/from the Rural Retreat Percheron Co-Operative Breeding Association from 1939-1944. Also laid into the ledger are additional minutes written on the reverse of the inlaid materials including an advertisement for "Truman's Stud Farm."
